Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has not yet received the delivery.

Could you please contact the supplier and ask where the package is.

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

After checking the tracking link, it seems that the package is likely to be delivered on 3 June around 13:45 to 17:45. Thank you for your understanding and patience. 

Regards,
CH

Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: I still can't get my package 📦 not Can you find a solution for me????

Thank you very much for your help,
Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: I haven't received a package yet. Thank you for your help,
Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem. I haven't received any response so far. Thank you for your help,
Hello, My product is iPhone 13 and it has the above problem: How can I get my money back again? Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.
 
Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner about the issue and will update you accordingly. In the meantime, kindly request the customer to provide a handwritten CND. Do note that the previous CND has all the required details, it just needs to be handwritten.

Regards,
JH

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours, or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Tania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the relevant documents. We will continue our investigation with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

The 24 hours are up, as you have not met the deadline, we will refund the customer 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The courier needs a valid email address from the customer as well. 

Regards,
RK
